reviewText: I will not play here in the US

This is a product from England and is not coded to play on American
DVD players.

Zero indication of this in the description. I suppose they will refund my money (not a big deal) but I also suppose I will have
to pay the postage both ways which will eat up the entire cost
of the transaction.

Would it be so difficult to give us this information up front to keep
us from wasting our time and money?
